title: Four injured in four-car pile-up
content:
MARQUETTE - Four people received minor injuries after a four-car pileup at the intersection of U.S. 41 and Brickyard Road. According to a press release from the Marquette County Sheriff's Office, the accident happened at 1:35 p.m.

Police said Ruth Wisti, 83, of Hancock, slowed to turn left onto Brickyard Road while her vehicle was eastbound on the inside lane of U.S. 41.
